Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-12905 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-18
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-12905 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-18. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-18, affected by CVE-2024-12905
